originalText.text: I needed my 75 inch tv mounted today. I googled and came across Andrew information. I called him and he was at my apartment in 2 hours. Andrew is knowledgeable, respectful, polite and very quick. I would recommend him to anyone who needs their tv mounted. Thank you again Andrew. Satisfy customer

originalText.text: TV Installation in New York did an awesome job. We needed our TV mounted on our brick fireplace. We called this place and the installer came out to give us quote the same day. His price was excellent and was able to do the work immediately. He is very knowledgeable and gave us some different options. The end product is awesome. Nice neat clean install. I truly appreciated him taking that much time with me and will be looking for him to do projector installation in July.

originalText.text: We called TV Installation in NYC when we moved into our home and wanted to mount our TV and install a new home entertainment system. Their representative talked us through all of the options and ultimately purchased and delivered most of the equipment. Their team was great to work with, and they came in within the expected budget they provided. We were so happy with the initial job that we asked them to come back later that year to install backyard speakers, where they once again advised on the best equipment for us and the final expense was within the budget. Highly recommended.

originalText.text: The technicians sent by TV Installation in New York literally just left my house and did such an amazing job I had to write about it. I wanted a stereo setup for my den, which included a mini receiver and ceiling speakers. The work was terrific, the sound is amazing, and the price was awesome. In addition, the guys were super clear about all of the costs and options, so no surprises at all. The house is cleaner then when they arrived. My den is a happy place now. Thank you for such fantastic work, guys. We will be in touch for my home theater installation.

originalText.text: After calling several places to find someone that could mount my TV, I was able to reach TV Installation in New York. When the crew of installers arrived it was clear from the start that they all knew their stuff. From immediately recognizing the TV to discussing the pros and cons of the mount I had bought, their knowledge is what stands out. They also gave clear and concise choice of options when discussing the mount and never pushed on any decision. In the end, my TV looks great and very secure on my wall, the cables are well hidden, and they made sure everything that had worked before worked perfectly after the install. Very professional, very quick, and very good. I'd have no problem getting these guys again for a professional installation and would definitely recommend them over the big store squads that both charge more and probably do a less professional job.
